Member Function Documentation

StringTable::languageCode LangUtility::getLanguageCode (  const char *  langStr  )  [static]
 

Get the languageCode for a language string.

This is the same as getStringAsLanguage but converts using ItemTypes::getLanguageTypeAsLanguageCode.

LangTypes::language_t LangUtility::getStringAsLanguage (  const char *  langStr  )  [static]
 

Get the language_t for a language string.

First tries LangTypes::getStringAsLanguage then LangTypes::getISO639AndDialectAsLanguage and finnaly ItemTypes::getLanguageCodeAsLanguageType.
